price: 49. Dis : « Ô hommes ! Je ne suis chargé que de vous avertir explicitement. »
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
